description: Motorsport is an exacting world that requires total commitment from its engineers. Without their skills and expertise, teams donâ€™t even get to race. This MSc will hone your skills and expertise in relation to motorsport and high performance engineering through a rigorous combination of teaching and motorsport related project work.Who is it for?Developed in collaboration with leading motorsport companies, this postgraduate programme prepares graduates for a career in motorsport or high performance engineering.
